question_text: Compare early internode growth acceleration between treatments by computing the difference between mean(INTERNODE_2) and mean(INTERNODE_1) for branches with IN > 5. Which treatment shows the highest acceleration?
solution_trace: 1) Compute early growth acceleration (INTERNODE_2 - INTERNODE_1) for control branches with IN > 5. 2) Compute acceleration for PP_333_20g/L. 3) Compute acceleration for EL_500_20g/L. 4) Find which treatment has highest acceleration using aggregate_hooks.
